Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Complete XP/level/streak system implementation

Database Layer (user.ts):
- Add updateStreak() - properly calculates daily streaks with day difference logic
- Add getDailyProgress() - counts completed tasks per pillar today
- Add getAllStreaks() - returns current streaks for all 4 pillars
- Fix addXP() to use consistent level calculation (XP / 100 + 1)

Random Tasks Integration (randomTasks.ts):
- Import addXP and updateStreak from user.ts
- Update completeRandomActionTask() to call both functions
- Log comprehensive activity data (XP, level, streak changes)
- Add console logging for task completion feedback

AppStore Integration (appStore.ts):
- Import getUserStats, getAllStreaks, getDailyProgress
- Modify loadAppData() to load from SQLite instead of just AsyncStorage
- Fetch real-time XP, level, and streak data from database
- Properly integrate with authStore to get userId
- Fall back gracefully if no user is logged in

Streak Logic:
- Same day: don''t increment (prevent spam)
- Next day (diff = 1): increment streak
- Missed days (diff > 1): reset to 1
- Update last_active_date on each completion

XP & Level Calculation:
- Consistent formula: level = floor(total_xp / 100) + 1
- Level 1: 0-99 XP
- Level 2: 100-199 XP
- Level 3: 200-299 XP, etc.

This fixes the broken progression system where XP/levels/streaks weren''t updating.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

EOF
